resources.string: English Quiz
What´s it HTML?
What is the name of the tool that was created on 1989, that has a lot of documents like: videos, photos, sounds and hypertext that are all translated through de browser?
What is it the Internet of Things?
Choose the alternative that corresponds to the protocol that is used between the communication of two devices

What´s Material Design?
Which one of these languages are not object-oriented?

In networks who represents the mask /24?
